content.detailedDescription: was just taking a picture outside my hotel room and was going to send it to a friend as i was looking at the photo i noticed something over the tree top line and when i blew the picture up i noticed the object
content.summary: I didn't notice anything unusual in the photo until i blew it ups

content.detailedDescription: I first noticed it out the window then i went to a second floor balcony and started taking pictures and videos it also hovering on top of the world trade center in new york city freedom tower on top of the antenna.
content.summary: It was hovering first i noticed it through a window and then i went to the balcony and started filming and taking picture  .. it was hovering over freedom tower world trade center on top of the antenna in new york city to

content.detailedDescription: I was in my bed, looking at my phone in the dark with my blinds open, it was a full moon so it was a bright night.  all of a sudden my room filled with light, a bright flash. thinking it was lightening i looked out my window and noticed a rectangular light hovering a couple  hundred feet above the fence in my back yard. at first i thought it was a helicopter with a spot light looking for someone, but there was no sound and it was kind of wobbling. the light was very bright and i as i tried to figure out what it was it made a weird quick curve upward and vanished with this blue trail. it did not fade gradually like a airplane would or a shooting star. it was like a vacuum sucked it into the sky.. when i saw the object i was confused, but when i noticed it was hovering, my heart was pounding and was like a deer in headlights.  when it disappeared my arms and legs got goosebumps and i was in shock. i was scared and light headed. the object took off in flight and disappeared.
content.summary: Very brief rectangular light hovering above neighbor house and then took off.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving south to home on barracks road in charlottesville. husband spotted ufo and proclaimed "that is not a regular airplane." looked out window, stopped in road, when i saw it was hovering almost slightly above us. distance can not be determined - maybe 2500 ft above. it had several bright white lights, some flashing, others remain constant. intuitively, we sensed that it sensed us and perhaps saw us stop out car in the middle of road, to which it then hovered for at least 10 seconds. then it continued on a low altitude path. my first instinct was that it is an advance government aircraft and i felt thrilled at witnessing the technology is conveyed to our sight. we turned around and watched it, and i took a quick photo with my camera phone, that unfortunately did not do justice, but shows two bright white lights as it continued on its path away from us. 

in the picture there are buildings, above one building, you can see the two white lights.
content.summary: Witnessed triangular craft, quite large flying low altitude, then hovering, then flying again

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting on my back patio facing w, having just burned a small fire in my chimenia, relaxing outside with my dog. i first observed the bright light/lights thinking it was the first visible star of the night around 2115.  after a few minutes i realized that it was not a star and found myself staring at it in awe and thought to myself, come closer. i woke my wife and she agreed with me that it was a multi colored lighted object stationary in the western sky. we observed with the naked eye and through bushnell binos.  i reported it to the arvada pd and they dispatched an officer.  the officer agreed to the multi colored lights and that he didn't know what it was either!
i'm a federal leo and my wife is a flight attendant. so we are drug free and had not been drinking. i took several iphone 6s photos of it.
i am a star gazer and have never seen anything like this before.  feel free to contact me.
thank you.
regards,

w. conlon
content.summary: Object with multi colored lights in the western sky

content.detailedDescription: Over one year myself and a relative watched the air traffic ,near by was an airport. however we watched for stranger thing's. on multiple occasions we both together witnessed over 30 ufos. all with different aspects. we do have one small set of three photo's however it's felt the information gained is much more important. before seeing the specific reported ufo however it was the only one to dematerialise. as if pressing an art programs fade out button until something has vanished into tiny pieces. before it vansihed the wind stopped it was calm. but the night had been very windy and dark. we were under street lights walking in a local naborhood.Down to a local church parking lot we always walked by.  my relative told me we would see a ufo tonight. an older woman in her 40s. i was skeptical however i walked with her regardless. she often told me story's of texas and how if is have followed her all her life.Some good and some terrible. this was also a spiritual woman. when the if i was in the area she knew and i felt as if some form of energy filled the area. i'm sensitive to even tv's and electronics however this was a more massive pressure and feeling of extreme energy that felt as if it moved in a pattern. like scans over and over. countless times with a heaviness. it was not present for me considering i feel energy. we walked to the church after my relative wanted to find the ufo. we looked out into the sky at the church. we ourselves are spiritual. believing in the creator,or self existent one. she got me attention and pointed out into the sky as i turned i said hey what is it. she said there it is and i was speechless. i looked up and immediately seen the ufo with her. however over the direction about middle to the local wal-mart and shopping area only later did we realize it was much larger and further away. to figure it must have been in the bay. also that the energy feeling was there over an hour in all.  we seen numerous other encounters. 8 flew over the suburbs on july 4th they all were red. balls that time. flying random paths. the other two major if is one went from the mobile location to grandbay in cloud cover this info had been silver grey. and one red.Another was yellow all on close paths different times and days. near dark or after dark.  once we watched over 5 yoga look like they were playing in a very very bad huge lighting storm there also had been tons of tornados and topical storms at that time.  i watched this with her about 7 or 8, times.  lastly we walked down to the water in the area back in mobile. it was a river or stream. i'm not sure. late one night it was dark we talked to a high chilled area on the road near a tree line that drops into a bottem that leads to the water.  i believe the church is livingword church and the road was the name of a pirate or something of that theme. it's right by it. anyway i worn a white hoody and a cigar shapped black and sliver craft hovered over the water as if it's searching for something with a light that came out of the front. it shined near us. i took my jacket off quickly. even though i figured it could track out phone devices and knew we were there. however my relative said to take it off so i did. next we did our best to hide on the edge of the tree line and brush. the if i left it was night. around 9 pm again.  it left moving forward and over a tree line. also one time we watched a large blue streak make a check like mark and shoot off for the bay into the sky i also seen an old looking plane.I mean classic. flying out in grandbay. and it disappeared into a weird looking cloud over the bay area.  no sound.No plane.  another account i was walking around grandbay and out to the bay near dark i watched over 4 red lights move in patterns. it looked as if maby a super giant massive ship could be there. that maby the lights were just it's lights on it.  they vanished about four or five minutes later.  one encounter i wasn't there for with my relative and those past two she wasn't there. she sent me photos and i still have them. i've named them the triangle urban ufo picture's. and may release them anonymous to the internet. as sighted in mobile al.  please investigate those area's. maby people i've known have seen ufos also. we also have noticed tons of black vans and black helicopters.  sometimes chasing these strange craft's.  goodluck mufon.
content.summary: As it had been spinning it admitted heavy energy all across i believe mobile alabama,sims and the mobile bay area. the massive from a distance ufo was silver grey with a red tent and possibly small square windows. myself and a relative watched it dissolve

content.detailedDescription:
Please be advised, this is from a few years ago, dates and times are highly approximate but i thought i'd give mufon this report just for its records. i believe it was summer but i remember more of what happened than when. for all i know these could have been drones.

i'd just been picked up by a friend and was heading approximately west, down amity drive away from capricorn terrace. i was looking out the front window of the car and saw what i at first assumed to be the lights of an airplane, one orange one blue, and quite small, just pinheads of light. not unusual at all as we live close to the montgomery county airpark, but these lights did not blink. but as we drove towards them, they rushed forward towards us and after a few seconds, those lights that were moving parallel to each other, suddenly, and with the movement very like those of insects in flight, spun around each other up and over, one under, then went one left and one right. they were gone from my view within a second or less. my friend who was driving had already begun turning left onto epsilon drive by this point and had not seen this. i was unable to reacquire sight if them.  i felt surprised and a little nervous but rather excited to have finally seen something like that. again, these could have been drones, but the speed was remarkable.
content.summary: Two orbs of light that flew like insects then parted rapidly

content.detailedDescription: There was a group of about half a dozen small, bright white orbs high above.  one seemed a little closer and brighter than the others.  they seemed to be either stationary or moving very slowly.  the orbs were visible for about 15 to 20 minutes before disappearing completely.  i attempted to take a picture with a cell phone, but there was nothing clearly visible in the image.  using my 35 mm film camera, i took several pictures but i will have to wait until i get them developed.
content.summary: A formation of small, bright spheres

content.detailedDescription: Standing on a lifeguard stand looking at the ocean when all of a sudden multiple orbs appeared in a path that followed each other and then the ufo came out of nowhere and glowed/hovered for 15seconds and then dissapeared.  i instantly thought it was a ufo since it looked nothing like a plane, blimp, or helo(helicopter). it appeared as fast as it disappeared but hovered for about 15seconds.  i thought it was amazing the way it stayed in the air with its glide like slow motion then shot away.
content.summary: Multiple orbs in straight line then ufo came out of nowhere

content.detailedDescription: I was just north of rapid river on birch farm picking mushrooms, not finding many, and i wondered into an open field that served as an ultralight runway years before, and i looked up over the treye line toward the morning sun and saw a large spherical object just chilling a few tree stands over.  it warbled a little while hovering for maybe 30 seconds while i stared at it, and accelerated smoothly moving back 5-10 miles back toward rapid river in a few seconds.  thinking back to this morning i have to believe there was a glint off the thing near the sun that must have been enough to attract my attention.  i thought the object was a balloon or a plane or a helicopter at first, it was just hovering though, no trail or noise, and i had noticed a noisey dual prop plane earlier.  my feelings about what i saw are simple, just trying to differentiate between an airplane, and superman.  afterwards i thought about traveling that fast.  i didn't really lose sight it justo got to be too small.
content.summary: Picking mushrooms out on birch farm saw something hovering that wasn't a drone

content.detailedDescription:
We went out on the deck for a smoke and had just sat down and as we were looking across the street and we seen this flying oval shaped object come from the south flying right over top of the legion crossing the street and headed north flying maybe ten feet above the houses across the street. it seemed to have a cloaking device that reflected the sky and clouds around it. if it was not moving i would of never seen it. the object is a ufo man made or et i don't know. but by the height of the object seems to suggest that it was flying below radar. as such this action would suggest that the object is man made and controlled. unless the et is not advanced enough to cloak it self from radar. lol unlikely.

as the ufo flew the cloaking imagine rolled into its self it was really cool to see something like this in our life time. i imagine it would only hold 1or 2 people or it was a drone. it kept heading north until it was out of sight.
content.summary: We seen an oval shaped object that seemed to be reflecting the sky around it if it was not moving we may not of seen it.

content.detailedDescription:
Diversos pobladores de la provincia de sã¡nchez carriã³n, en huamachuco, departamento de la libertad, en perãº, se encuentran sorprendidos por el avistamiento ovni ocurrido recientemente. segãºn los testigos, el ovni â€“ avistado durante el mes de mayo (2016) â€“ aparece de manera concurrente, sobre y en las inmediaciones del cerro tucupina desde las primeras horas de la maã±ana. 

los testigos relatan que el extraã±o objeto no parece moverse a pesar de que transcurren muchas horas del dã­a, debido a lo cual descartan que se trate de un aviã³n o drone. igualmente los pobladores del sector marcabalito afirman que lograron captar imã¡genes del ovni el cual aparentemente presenta muchas luces, sobre todo rojas.

este caso es similar a uno reportado en cusco, perãº, el mes de abril de 2016. hay la posibilidad de que se trate de un globo atmosfã©rico o una antena de internet de las que utiliza google en zonas alejadas; pero hasta ahora no hay nada confirmado.
content.summary: Ovni similar a globo en huamachuco, la libertad, perãº

content.detailedDescription:
I was working in tampa fl at an international trucking company. a gentleman was brought into the office and was introduced as the new v.P. of the southeast division. i can only remember his first name as "joe". he was very tall - i'm guessing 6 feet or taller. my head came up to his shoulder, and i was 5ft 5in at the time, and very slender. there was no one else in the office at the time that he walked in and looked around. i noticed that he seemed very pale in color, had silver-grey hair, wore a white shirt with a grey necktie, and wore a light grey suit. i walked over to introduce myself. as i told him my name, i held out my hand to shake hands with him. at first touch his hand was ice cold and his fingers were long, and as he grasped my hand a "vibrating" electrical shock went from my right hand up to my elbow. we released hands and i glanced up at him. his eyes were dark and he had a slight smirk on his face. it immediately went through my mind that he knew that i knew he was not human. i just slowly walked away and he walked back out onto the dock where the freight was. he never spoke a word the whole time. i was shaken by this occurrence, but i never told anyone. this "happening" bothered me for many months. i never told anyone for many years, except that one day my husband and i were watching a television program and the host asked "have you ever met an e.T.?" 
without thinking i said "yup, i shook hands with one." as soon as i said it, i got up and went into the kitchen. i couldn't believe i said that out loud. my husband said "what? why didn't you say anything?" and i replied "because i knew no one would ever believe me." i never told my husband anymore about it, and never spoke of it again. until now. i have always believed in outer-space beings since i was a child. the only reason i'm telling mufon is that my health is starting to decline and i feel that i must tell someone. over the years i've thought of it and how unnerving it was. i'm sorry that i cannot remember the exact date or time, i think it happened in  the very late 1990s or very early 2000s. i can't remember the time of year because they have no weather seasons to speak of in florida. i just remembered that within the next 3 - 4 months, it was mentioned that he abruptly left the company with no specific reason.
content.summary: I didn't see a ufo, i met an alien life form.

content.detailedDescription:
El pasado 17 de mayo un grupo de pobladores de san gabriel de varadero, en la selva peruana, aseguraron haber visto un objeto con forma triangular que descendió a una chacra de cultivos de plátano dejando huellas y emitiendo estruendosos sonidos.

los vecinos de san gabriel de varadero en loreto (perú) han decidido organizarse para protegerse de la presencia de supuestos ovnis en la zona. todo empezó durante el la noche del 17 de mayo, cuando un grupo de vecinos de esta localidad situada a tres horas de la ciudad de yurimaguas vio aterrizar varios objetos de forma triangular dejando huellas y emitiendo estruendosos sonidos, lo que provocó los gritos y escenas de pánico.

según informa el portal de noticias rpp, existen numerosos testimonios ha recogido algunos testimonios: «yo los vi, son similares a un cometa triangular con sonidos parecidos a la licuadora y con luces iluminantes.
para preservar mi integridad física y la de mi familia he tenido que hacer disparos al aire y de inmediato los objetos desaparecieron», relató preocupado el profesor german canchari. en el lugar del incidente detectaron la presencia de unas extrañas marcas triangulares sobre el terreno formadas por tres agujeros y marcas no definidas que los vecinos tratan de preservar hasta que lleguen los investigadores a hacer los estudios pertinentes.
content.summary: Objeto triangular descendió en loreto, selva de perú, dejando marcas triangulares.

content.detailedDescription: My father, my stepmother and i was coming back from church late one night, about after 10pm. we was coming down a road towards our home on boat mountain. we were on 235 looking towards the mountains of boat and sulfur mountain. i was laying in the back seat of my dads car, the my father stopped the car, rolled down the windows, and turned the car off. he stepped out of the car. i got up and was wondering what was going on. i sat up and saw dad looking towards the mountains. i was like...Omg. by that time my stepmother was flipping out, she was scared. i got out and went to the passenger side of the car with my dad. my dad was watching it and i began to watch it. i was like a disc shape but it had lights changing all around the rim of it. alternating in colors, from blue,to white,greens,oranges, golds, reds, pinks,...Was very pretty. i was very curious about it. my dad told me its nothing to worry about. we continued to watch it and a beam shot out of it, this whole time no sound.. nothing.. even with the beam no sound. the beam shot out of the bottom, then split into two. it did that for a few minutes then back together and then it zipped the beam back into the bottom of the ship thing. i was kinda getting scared. my step mother was crying wanting to go home so my dad got back into the car as did i. as we proceeded home, we lost track of it behind tree's. i never seen it leave or anything further. but i will always remember how my dad was cool,calm, and collective. telling me, it's nothing to worry about. so i took it as that. nothing to worry about. but as i have gotten older, and my father is passed he died in 1998 of cancer, which he had got from working on b2 stealth bombers, and other aircraft for hughes, lockeed, in california. i swear that's what killed him. from working with those planes. i wish i could ask him why i didn't need to worry? lol. anyways that's my story, best as i can remember. thank you.
content.summary: Was the weirdest thing me and my family had seen, i was about 14 at the time.

content.detailedDescription: Pics taken from my camera phone of objects seen near iss station live
content.summary: Pics taken from my camera phone while watching iss live. seems to happen a lot over ukraine as its passing

content.detailedDescription: New year eve i let my precocious 10 year old daughter stay up to bring in the new year. we had a window in the house that was about 20 ft. my daughter spotted what looked like a plane on fire in the distance with what looked like it was dropping flame from it. the house across the street had burned down the day before. as we watched it until we lost sight as it moved overhead of the house we ran to the front of the house to see if we could follow it. when we ran out of the front door it was hovering right over our heads except now it was a huge saucer blacking out the night sky. it made little noise a whirring sound. it was so close and had red and yellow lights on the bottom.We were so happy and excited never felt scared or threatened.It stayed for what seemed like 15minutes. after a bit it rose up straight still only making a whirring sound then instantly dissapeared in the sky. when we went back inside 2 hours had passed it was now 2am. neither my daughter nor i ever felt anything but excited.
content.summary: First like plane on fire then saucer right overhead

content.detailedDescription: I looked into the sky to the north of congleton and about 20 metres from my house i sore a disc like object that looked like a cloud but didnt move at all and the clouds behind it where considerably lighter in colour than the disc and the clouds where moving at about 30 miles an hour. similar things have been happening like this for a while in congleton and i have even seen an almost identical thing on google street view in almost the same place as i sore this one.
content.summary: I looked up into the clouds and sore a black disc which looked like a cloud but was not moving at all.

content.detailedDescription:
730am i came outside on my back porch n i noticed right away a shiny line towards the east. i thought at first it was part of the suns rays, but then realized lol the suns rays would not be horizontal. i looked n saw this long oblong shaped object in the sky above the sun. again i thought maybe i t was a reflection off my glasses so i took glasses off. it was still there n i could see that this thing had lights that appeared to be blinking all across it's length. i watched it for awhile going above the sun, to the left of the sun then below the sun the. to the right of the sun. i then went i to the house to get my cell to record this thing - not expecting it to still be there when i came back. but it was there n i took 2 videos of it. this thing continued it's "dance" n i got the impression it was trying to hide within the rays of the sun. i also seen two orbs of cloud like substance go streaking across the area where this object was. one strange thing about that morning was: there was not one single plane in the air, n i usually i will see 3-4 of smoke trails of planes. it was also a very bright blue sky n i don't recall seeing any clouds.
i continued to watch this thing n record until a little after 8am, when it finally went below the tree line (first time it did that). i did not stay outside to see if it came back up. it made me feel very sad, as i could imagine whatever was in that object was probably scared.
content.summary: It was a long shiny object that had lights all across exterior. it looked like it was having trouble n could not get enuf lift to leave. it kept going up then down then sideways for the duration of my observation

content.detailedDescription: We were driving from bradford up to rew when we noticed this lighted object off to our right. we then drove up to the summit and made a right turn and proceeded approx. 500ft.We then exited the truck to observe the object. myself and two companions watched object slowly pass overhead until it disappeared over the horizon. another vehicle with two or three passengers also stopped to witness object. i believe we were all rather awestruck and bewildered. we didn't discuss it much to my recollection except to ponder what it could have been. i don't recall anything ever in the news. none of us ever reported it. i have thought about it very often since it occurred all those years ago. it was nothing like anything i have ever seen before or since. i just wish i knew what we observed that night. i sincerely believe it was extraterrestrial.
content.summary: It just floated over us at 5mph with all these multi-colored lights

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was playing xbox 
2.I looked out my window because my dogs were barking, and i noticed lights in the sky about a block away.
3. at first i thought it was a plane but it was hovering 
4. it was spinning in a circle and just hovering in place
5. i was just confused and did nothing 
6. i looked away for a second to grab my phone to take a photo and when i looked back it was no where in sight
content.summary: Sudden and eery

content.detailedDescription: I'm alex samford and i'm 17 i have taken astrophotogrphy and i have been doing it for a few months now and i'm ok at it,the pic true below is a pic i took during sunset on my canon t5i and when i took it i didn't see anything no clouds in the sky and no planes it was just sky i it and saw something and when i looked back on the photo a day later i saw a object on left side middle and it zoomed up on it and it didn't seem like a cloud or a plans because they pass over head all the time and it was not a plane because if it was int was going off the flight path,it gave me chills what ever it is it seemed to just sit there in the picture
content.summary: Long,grayish black,

content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: My grandmother, stepmother and i observed this ufo over the mountains on reems creek in weaverville, nc.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: i was walking my dog and as we crossed the street a black object came floating in very smoothly and gracefully and glided just like a bird does dipping in the tree line. that iis what i thought it was at first. a very large bird  then right behind it came another . . it appeared like they were playing a friendly game of cat and mouse, i followed it with my eyes and it was going very fast and very high .Next thing i know it was getting further away and followed it with my eyes as far as i could then it was past the horizon
content.summary: Two black objects that made no noise at all.

content.detailedDescription:
Sighting ocurred after a torrential rain storm. total number number of observers: 3 what drew our attention was a military helicopter flying less than 800 feet in a flight pattern that we assumed that it was observing local streams/rivers based on the quantity of rainfall that fellin a matter of hours. then above the helicopter a disk appeared similar in shape to a wwi us soldier helmet. its flight pattern was directly on top of the helicopter. it did not make any sound, but the same was "wabbling" and it would "hide" within the dark clouds and later reappear. it seems that the helicopter crew did not notice the craft above them. the location was north of the city of caguas over a mountain chain known as "la mesa". from these hills you can observe at a distance the metropolitan area of san juan, puerto rico. unfortunately, we did not have a camera to record the event. i always keep this experience in my mind and now seeing documentaries and ufo topics in cable tv i have decided to report such event. this ufo hovered from left to right no more that 400 meters in either direction. after the weather cleared the same started to movre very slowly in an easterly direction and after a couple of seconds it dissapeared in a flash, moments later the weather cleared. the helicopter kept flying slowly in a westerly direction until it was no longer seen nor heard.
the question is if these beings have any control over the weather or these beings/crafts can manipulate cloud formations to their advantage. no metion of this was made on the local news/press. i do not know if anybody else saw or recorded such event. 

note:
i know the island is a "hot-bed" for ufo sightings. the latest was captured on infrared camera over the old ramey air force base located at the northwestern tip of puerto rico. the same was posted in youtube. it was filmed by the island's drug enforcement office. the camera was mounted in a blackhawk helicopter when the craft (ufo) came in view and was filmed. 
thanks,
jrr
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo appeared after a major rain storm. it seemed following a military helicopter (ng huey)

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching the movie "jaws for about the 15th time. there wasn't much else on and i hadn't seen it for years. this time, in the scene where the shark attacks the boat, i saw for the first time in the background a very fast moving object in the sky. i barely noticed it. i said to my self, what the heck was that?! i never saw that before in this film! i called to my step daughter to come and look. we had the ability to pause, rewind, slow down, live tv. i accidentally pushed the wrong button and lost it but i am sure it will play again so i am going to record it. then, right before i pushed the wrong button it appeared again right away going in the opposite direction. un-real. i hope you can see the same thing i saw if you are to view it. it comes right after the shark attacks the boat and the men emerge from the boat and roy shieder checks to see if he has bullets in his pistol and then again right after that. 

please check this out!
content.summary: Highly unusaual, extremely fast, odd looking narrow red trail, clear to the eye, moving at great velocity

content.detailedDescription: Was setting on my back porch watching planes in a busy air corridor towards dfw airport me watch object descend and stop, grabbed my phone and began filming. filmed craft slowly descend in cistance behind subdivision.
content.summary: Descending lighted craft observed in sky

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to work early in morning and my radio volume got really low and then it went back to normal. for whatever ever reason i felt like something was watching me. i looked up as i was coming around the bend in the road and above the tree line was a hoovering black orb. the orb then followed me the entire distance of the road and when i came to the end of the road and i was going to make a left turn the orb hoovered above the tree line directly in front of my car. i waited about a minute to see if it may be  balloons, but it did not move until i turned left and then it followed me until i got out of the country road and i was about 5 miles from town. i watched as the orb stopped and then abruptly turned back and headed back south going back to the direction that i had just come from. the movement was extremely quick and it looked like it took it maybe two seconds to make the entire maneuver.
content.summary: It was a black orb that could sense that was following me. it stopped when i stopped and followed until i got into lincolnton.

content.detailedDescription:
Hi my name is mr.🐝 i know that this might sound crazy,but one time before dawn i had discovered an ufo but did have no phone or recording device. i look up an was seeing all the beautiful stars but one of the stars caught my attention. it was like if it wanted to be seeing as a star red,orange, as i paused my steps it was going down and leaving a heat wave as it was deming going down slowly as it was maybe creeping, it stop for a few seconds. my hairs from the back of neck stood up cause i know it wasn't a normal stars cause stars don't do that. as it was still it flashed camera an took off in a tremendous speed like a blink an left a trail of fire smoke like out of earth....I got scared an started to lock the doors went to the room and prayed......
i finally bought a phone an downloaded a app and this is what i captured, ,, there was one big ufo an 2 aper  as it was 3,, ....P.S it made me look at the world different as we are really not alone please send me some feed back
content.summary: Similar star but orange red,white as it was coming down deming light stay still did a flash left a trail fire

content.detailedDescription: My daughter wanted to take photos of the black dirt fields near pine island, ny.  she took several photos and nothing was visible at the time the photos were taken.  when we arrived at home she was reviewing the photos and the object was in the picture.  the two photos were taken within the same minute on her phone, seconds apart and she could not see it when she took the picture.
content.summary: Daughter captured structure
